item.description:
This isn't actually European but it looks like a lot of fun and I love Indian dancing. This is the sixth year of this competition in Boston. Dance teams are coming from all over the east coast to participate in the competition.

The event is on Nov 13th at 6pm at the Orpheum Theater in Boston. Tickets start at $20 and can be bought on line. This is an after party at the Middle East at 10pm. The link to purchase tickets and other details are on the web site: http://www.bostonbhan...

After the show we can decide if we want to go somewhere, either to the Middle East or an Indian restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet just inside the front entrance

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Indian Dance Competition
